# brave build

Build an image from a Bravefile

```
brave build
```

## Description

Build an image from a Bravefile

## Options

```
  -h, --help            help for build
  -p, --path string     Absolute path to Bravefile [OPTIONAL]
  -r, --remote string   Name of a Bravetools remote that will build the image. (default "local")
```
